examples.example: 这道菜的味道不大符合我的口味，但我依然很开心能尝试新事物。

translate.english: The taste of this dish doesn't quite match my taste, but I am still very happy to try new things.

examples.example: 这次考试的成绩虽然不大理想，但我仍然会继续努力。

translate.english: Although the result of this exam is not very ideal, I will still continue to work hard.

examples.example: 天空中飘着不大的雪花，却给整个世界带来了一种别样的宁静与美丽。

translate.english: Small snowflakes are floating in the sky, but it brings a kind of special tranquility and beauty to the whole world.
